definitions.definition: fastener consisting of a narrow strip of welded metal used to join steel members
the kind of playing that involves pressing the fingers on the strings of a stringed instrument to control the pitch
come to a halt, stop moving
put an end to a state or an activity
hold back, as of a danger or an enemy
have an end, in a temporal, spatial, or quantitative sense
stop and wait, as if awaiting further instructions or developments
